content: Montebello high school in California. I'm looking at a photo of mexicans on our soil,at one of our schools, celebrating the American Flag upside down under a mexi flag. Time for can of whoopass to go along w/ the swine! Who let's these degenerates get away with this? Send me your email and I will send you the article w color photo of the trash. Support the border patrol...drive hwy 10 and keep a side arm. Remember the Alamo?!!!
